item.title: About Me
item.description:
My name is Michael Susens-Schurter (but I’m often lazy and shorten it to just Michael Schurter) and go by schmichael online. I’m married to the beautiful Samantha Wistera and currently a developer at Urban Airship.

You can stalk me various places around the web:

  • e-mail
  • Twitter as @schmichael
  • Photos on Picassa
  • LinkedIn
  • Facebook
  • schmichael on FreeNode or OFTC

For the curious: “good good study day day up” is a literal translation of a Chinese proverb more accurately translated as: “Only if you study hard will you make progress everyday.”

![schmichael snowshoeing][8]

[8]: http://schmichael.com/files/2011.02.20-snowshoeing.jpg
